### Description

The Pre-Load Air Cargo Targeting Program (PACT) at Transport Canada requires research and analysis of supply chain risks in foreign countries to inform its country-of-origin risk assessment list. Successful bidders will be responsible for conducting a risk assessment of the following:

- Identify and evaluate the supply chain risks associated with foreign countries
- Provide recommendations for mitigating these risks
- Develop a framework for ongoing risk assessment and management

### Selection and Evaluation Criteria

- Not applicable, as this is a single vendor award.
